## Slide with R Output

```{r cars, echo = TRUE}
library(leaflet)
set.seed(2016-04-25)
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(20, min = 39.2, max = 39.3),
                 lng = runif(20, min = -76.6, max = -76.5))
df %>% 
    leaflet() %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers()
```
